questions.question_text: Which statement explains the correlation between the block and alert thresholds in a vulnerability management policy?

choices.A: The thresholds can be set to informational, low, medium, high, and critical.
choices.C: The block threshold must always be equal to or greater than the alert threshold.
choices.D: The block threshold always has precedence over, and can be less than, the alert threshold.
choices.B: The alert threshold always has precedence over, and can be greater than, the block threshold.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

choices.B: orchestrated workflows to enable cross-functional teams to deploy infrastructure
choices.A: modern representation formats that describe and deploy infrastructure
choices.C: images to easily replicate and manage infrastructure

questions.question_text: What does Infrastructure as Code (IaC) collect to enable automation?
Which statement is specific for Prisma Cloud when integrating into cloud environments?

choices.A: An AutoFocus license is included in Prisma Cloud.
choices.C: Can be natively integrated into Prisma Access.
choices.B: For multi-cloud environment licenses are required for the number of Prisma Cloud instances.
choices.D: No agents or proxies are required.
